title: Hubbell Trading Post National Historic Site: Artist in Residence Program
body: Artist in Residence           Composer, Bill Pfaff recording sounds from an historic cash register. 2012   ARTIST IN RESIDENCE - 2016 HIATUS! We will not be offering the Artist in Residence Program in 2016. We want to thank the 2015 and former artists for their participation in the program and look forward to hosting a new group of artists in 2017. With all the activities surrounding the National Park Service Centennial in 2016, and the large number of artists we are hosting this year we need to take a break to revise our program guidelines and reassemble our selection committee. Please check back in the summer of 2016 for revised guidelines, application forms, and deadlines for 2017!          AIR artwork created at Hubbell Trading Post NHS.       "The Bunkhouse", by William Matthews. Watercolor on paper.         "Hubbell's Summer Porch", by Mishael Magarian. Acrylic on canvas.         "Tombstone", by Jeff Hubbell. Oil on board.         "The Barn", by Hank Miller. Color photographic print on paper.         "Sheep Is Life", by JoAnne Doshier. Watercolor on paper.         "Gazebo", by Lindsay Rose Olson. Sepia toned photographic print on paper.
